name: Room Escape VR
description:
Room Escape VR (REVR) is a mobile exit the room game for google cardboard and similiar VR devices. There are no buttons needed. Just look and focus on the objects you want to interact with.

This game was made during a course at Graz, University of Technology.

Important: This game requires a phone with GYROSCOPE. Without it, you won't be able to look around.

Music under creative common license.

Music Credits to:

A Himitsu - Icy Vindur
BOCrew - When the sky turns blue
Calico Cactus - Coursage
Djlang59 - Drops of H20
Eudorix - Trust me
From The Dust - Breath
